ComicInfo.Title: The New Regime
ComicInfo.Series: Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland Graphic Novel
ComicInfo.Summary: It's a brave new world in the quarantine camp, but when Remy reunites with Max, she realizes that the last thing she must do is leave him there! As the survivors adapt to their secure location, who will join Remy in an attempt to escape it? The penultimate chapter in this enhanced adaptation of Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), and Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 14:49:37. [CVDB424545]
